item.title: Re: Wastelands
item.content:encoded:
Uzuki has been the only person I know pointing it out regularly, but Hanging Out only provides the 0 chakra cost on regular missions. It doesn't provide its bonus on special missions, when using Bring Down the House while fighting a kaiju, etc. etc.

Some general suggestions for this mission are to use Bankai if you have it for the extra levels, go for the Range using Welcome to Good Burger if you can't hit the 16 difficulty without Jutsu, and use the Sword, Call jutsu for successes if your items bring you to or over 16 gen range.

item.title: Re: Wastelands
item.content:encoded: An interesting note, Hanging Out status does nothing to reduce chakra costs in the Revenge special mission, and presumably in the Wastelands proper. I found that out trying to do the mission with pure successes, since going for more range without any strength would be extremely painful. I'm 1 short of the range I need to have any real hope of winning the mission.
